metadata.Title: CVE-2018-16743 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in mgetty before 1.2.1. In contrib/next-login/login.c, the command-line parameter username is passed unsanitized to strcpy(), which can cause a stack-based buffer overflow.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-16743` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

mgetty - 1.2.1-1
mgetty-fax - 1.2.1-1
mgetty-pvftools - 1.2.1-1
mgetty-viewfax - 1.2.1-1
mgetty-voice - 1.2.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mgetty package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.1-1').
